pageContext.claim: “You have the World Trade Organization, which is a disaster for the United States. The World Trade Organization is probably the worst trade deal ever made with Nafta being second. The World Trade Organization helped create China.”
pageContext.analysis: The WTO, which accelerated China's economic boom, evolved out of the post-World War II economic infrastructure that the United States largely helped to create and foster. To a large extent, the international trading system embodied by the WTO has been very beneficial to the U.S. economy. Trump exaggerates the effects of NAFTA on the U.S. economy. The nonpartisan Congressional Research Service found that NAFTA had a "modest" economic effect.
